reason: The agent successfully opens the Broccoli application and navigates to the "New Recipe" screen. It then inputs the recipe title "Broccoli Salad." However, after inputting the title, the agent clicks on the "Categories" button, which leads to a pop-up indicating that no categories have been created yet. The trajectory stops here, without handling the pop-up or proceeding further with the recipe creation. While the initial steps are correct, the task is not fully completed.
